dublin_core.dcvalue: An effective mobile health strategy should comprise in the very least six key steps Conduct a mobile security risk assessment Establish policies and procedures Develop a training program Implement measures to prevent unauthorized access Perform a clinical workflow analysis Establish the organization s approach for responding to a breach
Made available in DSpace on 2020-02-06T17:32:16Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 0 Previous issue date: 2013-02-18
Healthcare financial management : journal of the Healthcare Financial Management Association
Strategies for safeguarding security of mobile computing.
